resting.name: button-background-primary-resting
resting.description: The background color of the primary button when it is in its default state.

hover.name: button-background-primary-hover
hover.description: The background color of the primary button when it is hovered.

resting.name: button-background-secondary-resting
resting.description: The background color of the secondary button when it is in its default state.

hover.name: button-background-secondary-hover
